meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Valerie Ryan Zach Klitzman Shyamlee Patel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7335.

td.p: Valerie Ryan, a Country Western dance instructor from Austin, Texas
Zach Klitzman, a public historian from Washington, D.C.
Shyamlee Patel, an office manager and student from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,401)

tr.td: MOVIE MISTAKES
LETTER PERFECT
WHO WAS PRESIDENT WHEN I DIED?
"CON"CENTRATION
BRAND NAMES
THE UNITED STATES OF KENTUCKY
(Alex: The category deals with states that border that state.)
